name: Christmas Swipe Sweeper Match 4
description:
Travel the World with Christmas Swipe and Collect the Jewels
A New Match 4 or more! Do not match 3!
Match 4 to earn points - match 3 you will lose points and risk not completing mission!
Venture alone, or invite your Facebook friends and challenge them! Who will arrive first at the last level! "earn coins!!"

Features of Christmas Swipe include:

-Revolutionary MATCH-4 gameplay
-Facebook Login
-Facebook App Invites
-Facebook Share
-3 Virtual Currency Pack In-app Purchases
-Game Center Leaderboard
-Achievements
-100's of Levels
-2 types of gameplay: timed or with moves
-Game Play Data is stored so early can be restored
-Facebook Friends and their scores are shown in the Map Scene
-Random Level Mode
-many more..
Let us know what you think of the game and give us some suggestions. We appreciate your opinion and we are working to add new levels and features.

Have fun with Christmas Swipe !
